explorer
Class AttributePanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JTabbedPane
                  explorer.AttributePanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class AttributePanel
extends javax.swing.JTabbedPane

The AttributePanel is a panel that contains the attribute table and the the viewers for all images that are not of type scalar. It is told by the AttributeTable when to add and remove viewers for these special kind of attributes, that is, images and spectrums.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Erik Assum
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

setTable

public void setTable(AttributeTable table)
setTable adds the table to this panel, that is, creates "Attributes" tab, which contains all attributes

clear

public void clear()
clear clears all viewers from this tabbedpane, except from the attribute table.

addEntity

public void addEntity(fr.esrf.tangoatk.core.IEntity entity)
Manages what to do when adding an attribute in the main attribute table

Parameters:
entity - the attribute to add in the main attribute table

addAttribute

public void addAttribute(fr.esrf.tangoatk.core.INumberImage image)
addAttribute adds an attribute to this tabbed pane. It will create a viewer for this attribute (in this case an imageviewer), connect it to the attribute and display it in a tab.

Parameters:
image - an INumberImage value

addAttribute

public void addAttribute(fr.esrf.tangoatk.core.INumberSpectrum spectrum)
addAttribute adds an attribute to this tabbed pane. It will create a viewr for this attribute (in this case a spectrum viewer), connect it to the attribute and display it in a tab.

Parameters:
spectrum - an INumberSpectrum value

removeAttribute

public void removeAttribute(fr.esrf.tangoatk.core.IEntity entity)
removeAttribute removes the attributeviewer for the entity passed as parameter.

Parameters:
entity - an IEntity value
